text: Backpacker Strong Wifi, Location and Hot water is good. The room size is very small, water pressure is very low, and Towel have bad smell, Arrival time, they kept 01 water bottle (500ml) after there is no drinking water. Note: In the booking.com site, it was mentioned everyday will do room cleaning. But I stayed 4 nights, and the housekeeping team didn't come to clean my room in that period.
Good. Customer Service needs to be improved

Horrible disgusting putrid the worst I have ever experienced refund my money i booked on your advice. Nothing to ne honest. A/c not working one guy came said fixed after and hour still not cooling. I paid for half board. They served same for lunch ànd dinner. Breakfast was horrible when asked I don't like it I want continental he went and never came back. I left as I had to go without eating. You call this service. We are a couple they put 3 single beds damn shame. I asked for a large room. We could hardly move inside..more but I guess it's enough what a waste and experience. Dont you ever check it out before you advertise. Refund my money back or else I go to court of law and sue you.Nothing to ne honest. A very pleasant stay. Breakfast was super.

The royal mall may correct its name as royal jail The room size is very very small like a jail .The corridor of room is narrow & it may not accommodate to pass through it if a big size person get into this passage.
Good value for money and a convenient place to stay Aggregated facilities around the premises Friendly staff
Wonderful Stay !! The place and rooms are very clean and the food is excellent. Worth for money
